title: Wikipedia Articles Dec 2024
description:
Cebuano is prominent on Wikipedia primarily due to the extensive use of a bot named Lsjbot, created by Swedish physicist Sverker Johansson. This bot has generated a vast majority of the articles on the Cebuano Wikipedia, making it the second-largest Wikipedia edition by the number of articles, with over 6 million entries235. Several factors contributed to this prominence:
Lsjbot's Efficiency: Lsjbot was designed to rapidly create articles, particularly about living organisms and geographical locations. It was highly effective in producing a large volume of content quickly35.
